name: ELITE HELICOPTERS PTY LIMITED
about: Elite Helicopters Pty Ltd, part of the Elite Aviation Group, is Queensland's premier helicopter operator with over 40 years of experience in South East Queensland. Based at Archerfield Airport with multiple remote bases, our highly experienced and qualified pilots are renowned for their exceptional service. Our extensive fleet includes Airbus AS350/H125, Airbus EC130/120, Bell 206 Longranger, and Robinson R44 and R22 helicopters. We offer bespoke private charters, winery and resort tours, aerial filming, lifting services, and firefighting. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we provide high-class services for all your helicopter needs. If it can be done in a helicopter, we can get it done for you.
